item.title: Jenkins
item.description: Jenkins es como gitlab runner. https://github.com/jaswanthnasa/Jaswanth-DevOps-Documentations/blob/master/jenkins.txt We are a small, dynamic startup in the cyber field. We’re looking for a skilled DevOps Engineer to join our team on a contract basis. The ideal candidate will be responsible for setting up Jenkins, managing and monitoring our AWS infrastructure, and overseeing the deployment processes. Key Responsibilities: Set up and configure Jenkins for CI/CD pipelines. Manage and optimize AWS infrastructure. Ensure smooth and automated deployment processes.
